t: Amazon.com: Icontrol Networks Inc. Piper Z-Wave Door/Window Sensor : Electronics
s: When we returned I ordered this IControl sensor, though it cost double what the Ecolink sensor cost, thus the deduction of one star. I do recommend screwing these to the frame and NOT relying on the adhesive tape that comes with it, and which allowed mine to fall, despite carefully installing it. So far so good. We just returned from a 4 day trip with no false alarms. ... Drops off network ...

t: Piper In The Pipeline At Amazon
s: September 24, 2014 - Redwood City, Calif. – Icontrol Networks is expanding retail availability of its Piper home-automation hub/security camera. In its latest move, the company is extending distribution to Amazon.com’s home automation section to supplement sales through its own GetPiper.com store.
